page.title: 13RECREATION IN ABBOTSKERSWELL
page.content: Most people spend their recreational time in the village. For tennis, squash, swimming and the cinema, a visit to the local town of Newton Abbot would be necessary. Some people play cricket in their spare time. There is an Abbotskerswell Cricket Club for men and some children from Abbotskerswell School play softball cricket. There are games and matches in the cricket season. Some people in their spare time play badminton. In Abbotskerswell there are two badminton clubs. There is one for children and the other for adults. There are several sessions. Abbotskerswell Youth Club is a club for the 9 - 17 year olds who live in the parish of Abbotskerswell. It has its own name "The Klub". It started on the 3rd. May, 1985. There is a park in the village with swings and a roundabout.
